pros: An indoor or outdoor firewood rack
Includes four tools that hang from the rack

customer_reviews.title: Caught Fire!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed w/ this product. One of the tools CAUGHT FIRE while using it. To extinguish, my husband and I had to submerge the tool in water. I find it surprising for fireplace tools to catch fire while using, esp. when described as "Black Wrought Iron". This is clearly not iron, but black painted steel! The fumes from the paint were awful & smelled up our entire house. Poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rogel

customer_reviews.title: A great bit of kit!  Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! Very solid construction appears to have the heft of wrought iron. Powder coating is thick and uniform. Might not hold up, but I'm very satisfied. Assembles in 5 minutes with just a Philips screwdriver and a good grip on the hex nut. No wiggle!! Holds a full stack of wood, top and bottom, like a champ. Bristles on broom are a little haphazard and plasticky, but it works great. Shovel is nice and tight against granite to sweep up the last of the ash. Very solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Beech

customer_reviews.title: Clean design, a little cumbersome for one person to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never purchased anything like this before. It was purchased as a “Santa gift” for my fiancé. I really hoped that I’d be able to put it together in my own so I could load it up with firewood and set it up while he was sleeping Christmas Eve (which is tomorrow)! I did and while it was a little challenging holding the parts together while putting in screws and bolts I managed. I’m SUPER happy with it and can not WAIT to leave it under the tree tomorrow night!!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for an 80s brass firewood rack and brass tools. For the price, this is a fantastic deal! I've searched long and hard for something that's not too fancy, but still good looking and functional. And this is perfect. It comes disassembled, but it's easy to put together. The tools are great quality, very solid. I like the loop at the end because it's not a separate piece. It's surprisingly sturdy and holds quite a bit of wood.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Picture... worthless manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: When assembling the item, I found bolt holes with incomplete punches. So no way to put the bolt through. Luckily I have the tools to fix that. However once completely assembled it wobbles horribly. The feet are off quite a bit. Now I could probably grind down the legs to match stumpy here. But why spend $65 for something that needs $100+ dollars in tools to fix. No way to contact seller. Not worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nelmes

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to Install and Very easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This Fireplace with 4 Tools is very Nice Looking. If you don't have this you are placing the Wood on the Floor. It looks Messy or YOu need to Kept outside. When you need it you need to get. That's kind of Painfull Job. By using this Rack you can keep the Wood in the Rack itself. It has an extra shelf to place your new papers and It has Hanger to Hang 4 Tools that are required for the Fireplace. The Package comes in the nice box they provided all the tools. It very very easy to assemble. I was able to install within 10 Min.
customer_reviews.author: SujjiTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: This log rack looks very pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the indoor use to hold the firewood. This log rack looks very pretty and sturdy. Very easy to assemble, my teenage son helped us put it up without any help. The tools are very high quality and makes me feel they will last forever. It is also a good decoration for the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Newland

customer_reviews.title: Unable to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived improperly machined. Screw holes were obstructed (metal wasn't punched out completely) and the unit could not be assembled. Amazon customer service was great, but the product was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and visually pleasing
customer_reviews.text: It was well packaged, easy to assemble and it fits on my fireplace hearth. The tools are great and seem to be well made along with the rack. The rack is light enough that i can move it but seems to be strong enough to hold the weight of the wood. The bottom shelf is great for holding our fireplace starters and small brushes. The upper shelf is not solid and if there was a improvement it would be for it to be solid too as debris from the wood does fall down through the shelf. I solved that lining the shelf with newspaper or you could us aluminum foil, whatever works. I am most happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Reader

customer_reviews.title: Product does not match Amazon description
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the size stated on the website, it is far smaller. The product does not match the description at all. In addition the material is rather flimsy and the nuts and bolts provided for assembly do not fit the pre-drilled holes well. Consequently, once the product was assembled using the provided nuts and bolts it was very unstable. Sadly I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastFL

customer_reviews.title: May catch on fire....
customer_reviews.text: after about two months of use, the paint on shovel caught on fire when shifting a log in our stove today. don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Dsher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fireplace rack w/tools attached, neat & clean.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, the only indoor double fireplace rack I’ve had it’s very nice. Very convenient and it looks great. The assembly was extremely easy and the tools look great and have been wonderful so far. This item holds much necessary wood & kindling and the tools are great as they are secure on each side & it’s cleaner than having logs & bark sitting in a small area which make a bit of a mess. This has lasted extremely well throughout the fall & winter it’s still like new! I’m particular & this actually has become a nice, good looking rack. Thank you, I like this very much.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H

customer_reviews.title: I liked it. Lasted two winters.
customer_reviews.text: It was a cute idea. It was definitely worth the small price. But after two winters of (admittedly roughly) loading logs in and out of it, some if the welds finally worked themselves loose. I could reweld it, but I have a better solution now. The tools, on the other hand have been perfect! I'm still using them with my new log holder more than a year later! I do recommend this product. But keep in mind that nothing (at this price) lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: D. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for outside for the firepit we built. I wanted something smaller to fit on out patio near the firepit, the bonus was getting 4 tools with it! Love the design, while being compact, putting the extra shelf was brilliant. It holds just enough wood and the tools fit 2 to a side. I am able to slide a heavy duty trash bag over the whole thing and my wood stays dry. We use a small bungee cord around the bottom to keep bag nice and secure from rain. Easy to refill from larger stack of wood, can also use the extra shelf for paper and kindling. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Had to return... replacement is better
customer_reviews.text: The product looks decent, the finish is nice and over all it was a good product. What annoyed me? The same issue everyone else has! The legs arent balanced properly. No matter where I put it or how I tightened the bolts I couldnt get the legs to all be the same height. It rocked back and forth constantly when picking wood off of it. Update: got a replacement that doesnt rock around. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Great little stacker holds the tools well.
customer_reviews.text: I like having this in proximity to the fireplace. You can stack enough wood for several hours, the tools are of a decent quality, and each tool hangs neatly on its hook. There are four hooks, two on each side, and you can arrange your tools as you like. You get a broom, a shover, a poker and long heavy tongs. A word to the wise: find the right location before stacking with wood. Once it's full of stacked wood, moving is not recommended. Empty, it is easy to move with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn WA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: We keep this next to the fireplace and it's the perfect size and impressive looking when stocked and full. The top rack holds a full large box of wood and we use the lower rack to hold Duraflame logs. I'd give it 5-stars if the handles on the tools were longer but aside from that, it's a great functional item that's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Petite Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Durable and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time with no damage. We have a raised hearth so like the size. Holds plenty of logs and kindling top and bottom. Very sturdy frame and tools. Love the 3-pronged log tongs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: An attractive and useful fireplace tool
customer_reviews.text: After deciding that we should stop simply dumping the firewood to the side of the firebox, my wife and I found and ordered the log rack. Although it doesn't hold the four days amount of firewood we would hope to have it hold, it is well made and gives us the opportunity to get the fire going, allowing us to bring in the bigger quantity we use. It is attractive and functional, with the tools needed to work a fireplace. We'd probably get another one next time, but it is solid and likely won't need to be replaced for a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Gangwere

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It’s junk. It’s too small to hold any realistic amount of fire wood and it’s not deep enough to hold a standard cut 16 inch log. It’s also very flimsy and I doubt it will last any length of time at all. Save you money it’s a total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nicely organized.
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding a nights worth of firewood. I use the bottom tray for a box with my paper and kindling, it also helps keep bark and other debris from the logs off the floor. The added tools are a nice quality also. I did have problems with one of the bolts didnt want to thread on the nut, a quick trip to the hardware store and $0.10 fixed that
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Enoch

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Strong
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about this purchase. Concerned with the quality and more importantly it's sturdiness. After carefully reading the reviews I took a chance. So happy I did and wanted to post this review. This is a very sturdy log rack and has served me well. I stacked it top and bottom and it is durable enough to support the weight. It looks great and is being used daily with these frigid temperatures. Beautiful and sturdy this was a great purchase at a very reasonable proce.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting this product to be amazing, given the price I paid, so I was surprised when the product ended up being a great value. The assembly was incredibly easy-- took me no longer than 10 minutes, and it is incredibly sturdy. We move it around frequently and it has not lost it's sturdiness yet. We often have wood piled high on the rack, and the cleaning tools that come with it are great!
customer_reviews.author: kennedyjanet

customer_reviews.title: fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: as a fireman I find this item questionable,you are using the utility tools to work at fire and coals and hanging the tools next to wood and newpaper,folks it takes 1 spark to make a flame up. aside from my concern the unit un packs and assembles in 15-20 minutes with a phillips screw driver and 10mm wrench, appears bigger in picture then it is. works fine for kindling just roll you're newspaper with the wood and keep nothing flammable on the bottom shelf.quality is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: OL MAN FITZ

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have a small house & needed a compact little log rack that fit in a small corner near my wood stove. This is the perfect size, affordable, easy for me to put together and extremely functional. I am extremely happy with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got this to tidy up the area around our fireplace. We'd been using a big wicker basket which was cumbersome. The log rack was easy to assemble and serves our needs. It looks very nice next to the fireplace and I'm happy to have the floorspace back from the big basket. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Prince

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and a lot more room then it looks. Probably one of my best buys this winter has kept the wood from scratching up my hardwood floors and everything together so I'm not constantly running around looking for tools to clean out my fireplace or to move wood around.
customer_reviews.author: Real Honesty

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use the heck out of mine. It is large enough to hold a whole days worth of wood. it isn't as sturdy as i would have hoped, but it is hanging in there, and looks good
customer_reviews.author: NurseNay

customer_reviews.title: Needed For Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me you would love to pie on your wood but it would be hard without this product. Really changed the way I store wood and easy access would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Log rack with tools
customer_reviews.text: This is the most perfect log/paper/tool rack we've ever owned. (woodstove owners for over 40 years) Perfect for a day of burning. The tools are heavy and hang nicely on the rack. The rack is sturdy and just the right size. Everything all in one neat package. WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Crazyd37

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and liked it so much that I bought another one! Super strong and easy to assemble. One of these will hold approximately 4 bundles of the standard firewood you can find at Lowe's or Home Depot. Highly recommended and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We don’t require a lot of wood storage, so this piece is exactly what we were looking for. Tools are great and like that they’re integrated right into the design. Using the lower shelf for newspaper and kindling. Fairly easy to assemble. Looks great next to fireplace. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neil B.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made. Not flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: One might thing this is not sturdy or that it is flimsy. But this product is anything but. We have loaded it with wood and it is well made. Love the option for all the tools hanging on the sides. This is a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Thepowerofgrowth

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and compact
customer_reviews.text: Received this and had it assembled in about 20 minutes. It is perfect for organizing my kindling and fire starter equipment. In addition, the fireplace tools are included and stored on the unit which makes for a very uncluttered look. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stan R

customer_reviews.title: Great all around fireplace piece
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful, is sturdy and is perfect for a new fireplace owner like myself. I like that it has two levels and fire tools. It’s big enough for functional storage but not so large that it takes up a lot of floor space. It’s also very lovely looking in my living room. Overall, quite satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Amazon Friday afternoon and got it delivered Saturday morning. Beats waiting on Walmart! It was easy to put together. It’s very sturdy and a little heavier than I expected which is good because it’s solid and not cheaply made. And I love that it hangs the 4 piece tool set nicely which are included with the item. What a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Has everything I was looking for. With the four hooks for tools I’m also able to hang my gloves. also can put the canvas wood bag I had already in the top without taking wood out of bag.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling parent

customer_reviews.title: It’s very small
customer_reviews.text: Read description and check measurements...I didn’t. It’s a Nice decoration, but too small to be useful for a real wood burning fireplace. The amount of wood it holds wouldn’t even last one night.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Burke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: quite easy to assemble (I had needle nose pliers to hold the nut in place to get the screw tight), incredibly sturdy, has good weight to it, tools have good weight to them too, love the shelf so you can put a basket of kindling underneath. Looks great! Cons: ... can’t really think of any!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand for the price. It was so easy to put together and is very sturdy.. love the way it looks and fits perfectly byy fireplace. The tools are great and hooks for them are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t mind the dust. We love this little thing! Couldn’t write a review before because I bought it in the summer time. Was great to hold my plants in the summer too. Really adds character to my home as well. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandylee S.

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Friday, received Sunday! Easy to put together (less than 10 min). Sturdy! Holds a decent amount of wood so that you're not running in and out to keep the fireplace/stove burning.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, holds all of our fire tools
customer_reviews.text: We just got this in, so I can't comment on the durability, but we love it! We didn't use the shelf, but it still holds the wood well and is sturdy. It looks great next to the fire place too!
customer_reviews.author: Austin R.

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of wood and it looks great!😀
customer_reviews.text: I am 76 years old and I put it together myself! So easy to put together! It came with great directions! It holds alot of wood! It looks great on my porch! Wood is stacked nice and clean!Thank You!😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is way too small
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize or notice the dimensions when I ordered. But it is solid, like the bottom solid panel, wish the larger sizes had a middle brace or a solid bottom, not too worried about the sides and our normal size pieces of wood falling through the sides. Will continue searching for a larger one. The tools for the side are great and nice to have them hanging out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Great looking log rack
customer_reviews.text: Log rack is beautiful and solid. Very easy to assemble, all you need is a screwdriver and size 10 wrench. It took my 5 minutes to do it. Tools feels heavy duty however they are too big to clean out indoor fireplace. Handles are too long to maneuver inside fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have trouble finding a log holder that will sit on our fireplace and hold enough logs to keep us from running out to the log stacks every few hours. We also hated having a log rack AND fireplace tools. This log rack is PERFECT! It hold hours and hours of logs to burn and also has hooks with fireplace tools attached. It is a nice looking piece as well. We are really happy with the purchase and my wife was able to assemble it by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Casa99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of this rack and the size is perfect next to our fireplace. We can put 12-14 logs on the top and a basket full of scrap paper and kindling on the bottom. The tools are surprisingly sturdy and hang well on the side hooks of the stand. Timely delivery, well packaged and easy assembly. Would definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Mags121

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've actually found myself using the accessories a lot to clean my fireplace. Originally, they we going to be more for show. Very pleased with purchase. Have recommended it to 3 friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece to clean up the stray logs sitting on the ground around my fireplace. It required a little effort to get the screws to stay in place, but it was a quick 15 minute set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Heston

customer_reviews.title: hold a lot of wood
customer_reviews.text: works great and holds a lot of wood. it looks great next tot he fire place. it does scratch easy. i wish it had adjustable feet to keep it level.
customer_reviews.author: rbaisden

customer_reviews.title: Must have for fireplaces/wood stoves
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all in one fireplace/wood stove organization tool rack. We put firewood on top and kindling on the bottom and the tools are exactly what you need. Makes everything look nice and organized without taking up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Wife Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to keep the wood in cardboard boxes in the living room during the winter. She is much happier with this product. It does as expected. It holds about two nights worth of wood in it. I am happy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dancin' Don

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and holds well together
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and easy to assemble. Holds very well together and not what other reviews are stating that it falls apart when putting wood in it. Very slick and modern looking. Great price for quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for smaller log use
customer_reviews.text: it is perfect size for use by my fire pit. I covered. I know it said it was for indoor use, but couldn't find outdoor use o e that was compact like this. My daughter is buying one for I door use as it is so great!
customer_reviews.author: nrdolan

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to fireplace.  I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my fireplace! We keep it loaded with more wood than it’s supposed to hold. Not able to rate its sturdiness yet. I’m not sure how durable it is because I’ve only installed this season. I like it and hope that it holds up for several years.
customer_reviews.author: FannyT

customer_reviews.title: Good value, looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our small fireplace ledge. It’s holds enough firewood for a fire, and it doesn’t look tacky in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be the first one to admit I am not one to put together things but this was super easy to put together and it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my dad next to his wood burning stove, it holds a ok amount of wood & it looks nice. its not cast iron or anything but its sturdy for the price. the tool set is nice also - i like that there are hooks on the stand that they hang on.
customer_reviews.author: JP Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous buying this but I am glad I did. Assembly was easy and the unit is actually durable and holds a decent amount of wood. Tools work well too.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn webb

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood rack next to the fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Assembles in minutes with an adjustable wrench and screwdriver. I particularly like the tools and hooks are included. We place tinder and starter on the lower level (there are two shelves). The upper will hold enough firewood for a modest evening fire. Style, of course, is up to the buyer. I liked this one.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat flimsy, but we don't anticipate heavy use to it should hold up okay. It does look nice, but it may be a little pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Love my fireplace log rack
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together (maybe 5 minutes). Fits perfectly on my hearth and holds the perfect amount of firewood! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: casey r rogers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great log rack. It looks attractive sitting on our hearth and took minutes to assemble. I was surprised at the quality of it considering it has a low price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Baker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little wood holder!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our living room - to hold wood for a day or two's fire. Was quick and easy to assemble, and is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new home and we love it so much. Holds a good amount of wood. Love that it comes with all the tools for the fire place. The quality is great and will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: soso

customer_reviews.title: Great wood holder and tool set
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of wood as well as kindling underneath. Sturdy. Tools work well and are very useful. We really like it.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great little log rack. Perfect for smaller spaces near your fireplace or wood stove. We are thinking of purchasing another for other side of hearth
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN DANOS

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made and holds plenty of wood. Tools come with it and are good quality. I would recommend this to anyone. looking for wood storage near the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller areas
customer_reviews.text: A perfect size for my fireplace area. Holds enough wood for a few hours. Tools are long and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, pretty, handy w/ the tools on the outside...it's perfect...my only wish is that it held more wood.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than anticipated but that’s my fault for not paying better attention to dimensions. Study and a great addition, I don’t have to haul wood in more than once a day now!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wood Rack
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived well packaged and was easy to assemble. The overall appearance is very pleasing and goes well with the decor in my home. I believe this wood rack will be very durable as the metal is heavy gauge and the includes tools are well built.
customer_reviews.author: bhunter78

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what  I needed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a home that needed fireplace tools and this served perfectly for storing wood and tools. It is very sturdy and is great for having an organized look.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but the picture is very deceiving because this rack is very small. Good for kindling, but holds just a couple logs split of bigger stuff.
customer_reviews.author: sam smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks nice, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This wood rack is awesome. It’s small-ish, but it’s exactly the right size for our patio. It holds a fair amount of wood and fits into a small footprint. It seems sturdy and the tools hanging on hooks are a bonus. I definitely recommend this rack. It was very easy for me to put together, too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: A nice sturdy fire wood holder for my outdoor fire pit. It's solid and can hold about 20 pieces of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something nice enough to be inside my home, It not only looks nice works well also. Love the tools hanging on the sides, making it so convenient
customer_reviews.author: Tamie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We put this rack together yesterday and are very happy with the design. It was easy to assemble, seems sturdy and looks great next to our wood stove.
customer_reviews.author: CNovack

customer_reviews.title: This holds a decent amount of wood in a compact design.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this log rack. From the ease of assembly to the utensil holding hooks built in.
customer_reviews.author: robert n.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid rack not the flimsy thin metal that others sell. Perfect fit for the house we just had built which we call our "John Wayne" house because we tried to keep everything rustic. The tools that come with it are a perfect size and everything you need to adjust the fire and clean the ashes. Holds a lot of wood less trips to the wood pile. Assembly took about 5 mins. and bolt holes lined up just as they should they even gave me an extra nut and bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of wood for it's size.
customer_reviews.text: This log rack looks good, and fits the small space I had. It holds a surprising amount of firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Raymster

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, super easy to assemble. It probably took me about 5 minutes to put together. I saw the same one at Bed, Bath & Beyond for double the price. So glad I found this one online. I received it in about 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Joelean B.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the functionality and aesthetic. Easy to put together. Holds more weight than I had thought, sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Not as sturdy as I hoped but for the price it’s great. A lot of other reviews said that it came with silver screws and it looked odd on the black but ours came with black screws and it is very nice looking. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost all components are solid
customer_reviews.text: Two level log rack holds a surprising amount of wood. So far it's been sturdy and has not fallen apart this winter. Tongs and poker work quite well. Unfortunately, I took away one star for the weak brush. I got a different brush which I hang on the rack and use to wipe up ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Daytripper

customer_reviews.title: This rack is very versatile and Value!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is very versatile. Good for having it near your fire pit outside and of course it works pretty good inside. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Janis Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and high quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just put the rack together for a Christmas gift. Took 10 minutes to assemble, very excellent quality, and I'm sure they're going to love it!!. I couldn't be more pleased, exactly as described, and is the perfect gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Sturdy, not too big and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, not too big, not too small! Holds a great amount of wood and is about the same price asa decent set of fireplace tools!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's not exceptionally fancy or anything but it gets the job done. It easily holds a day's worth of wood and the tools are solid. Definitely worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I got exactly what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 4 out of 5 starts because it was a little smaller than I expected, but that was my issue for not measuring, not the sellers. This unit will hold about 6 x 8" round logs, split wood, and if you go smaller will hold a lot more. We do a lot of fire pits so for us I found that we would be filling it 2x per night so I needed one larger. But overall the quality is fine and it fills the need that we purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dahl

customer_reviews.title: A LOT smaller than it looks in the photos!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures can be deceiving... not sure how small the wood was they’ve got stacked on the product in the advertisement, but you won’t get much “normal sized” wood on this. It will be good for a home with a small wood-burning stove, but not practical for an older house with a large fireplace like ours. It seems to be well-constructed (just got it so we’ll see how long it lasts).
customer_reviews.author: Topher-21

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great as expected. When not holding wood in winter. I put a nice plant and candle on it. Nice piece. Happy
customer_reviews.author: DaniJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy little log rack. The tongs are the best part! We put a cardboard box in the bottom rack to hold kindling and bark/pinecones/paper.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up in seconds. Wood inside within minutes. Perfect. Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great inside firewood holder
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to keep inside by our fireplace. It’s the perfect size, put together in 15 minutes and tools are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle A. Gartin

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This unit was very easy to assemble. We like the look of it and the tools are fine. The only drawback is that it does not hold as much wood as our previous log rack and it also wobbles from side to side a bit. We do like the space for kindling in the bottom but would have preferred that the rack offered less room for kindling and more for firewood. A good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wabisabi17

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. Very sturdy and stylish makes my fireplace look great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Chavis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect and what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our fireplace. I wanted something that would allow us to store wood, kindling, newspaper, and tools while also looking styling. This met all my needs and expectations. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Amy

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller in person. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Was much smaller in person than it looked online. The screws also loosen up very easily. Pretty frustrating. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: andrew baldwin

product_meta.title: Amagabeli Fireplace Log Rack with 4 Tools Indoor Outdoor Fireside Firewood Holders Lumber Storage Stacking Black Wrought Iron Logs Bin Holder for Fireplace Tool
feature_bullets: Indoor / Outdoor: This space saving vertical firewood log rack with tool holders is perfect for your home's fireplace or your outdoor fire pit, can be well stocked with a bundle of firewood, hooks for all your fireside tools, and a steel shelf below the wood rack for fire starters, kindling or more firewood. Fireplace Tool Set keeps your firewood and tools in one convenient, lovely spot. This package offers all you need for an organized and attractive hearth.

Large Capacity: The log rack frame measures 29.1inx15.8inx11.8in, made from durable steel square tubing and powder coated black to ensure its durability and strength indoors and out. The significant metal stand forms a sturdy frame, with plenty of room on the 14.17inch by 11.8inch square base to accommodate your firewood. The 2in raised base above ground allows wind flow to keep dry.

Ergonomic Design: Integrated hooks on the stand create places to hang the included tongs, poker, broom, and shovel, to maintain the fire safely and easily. Two arched bars on the stand add curves to the dramatic unit, while a stepped detail at the top of each leg continues the look.
Easy to Assemble: Assembly required. The steel plate beneath the log rack makes room for kindling, fire starters, more fire wood or you can leave it empty to make the space seem more open.
CUSTOMER CARE: We are dedicated to provide premium products for you and offer impeccable customer care to you. Don’t wait any longer and just enjoy your ideal products today!
